title: cant buy a champ
body: i have 6300 more ip but i cant buy a 6300 champ    some one tell me y plz :(  its a bug???

replies.body: I've heard of there being issues using the new client. If you're using the new client, they were recommending to log into the old client to make your purchase. Hopefully that helps.
Probably a bug with the amount of IP being displayed, i have seen this a few times.
